data.name: ChainedTextFrame
desc: extends a TextFrame which shares the same Text with other ChainedTextFrame instances that will make the text flow through the chained frames.
The text flows in the next frame if there is no space left in the current frame.

properties.name: ChainNextName
desc: name of the previous frame in the chain
An empty string indicates that there is no previous frame.

properties.name: ChainPrevName
desc: name of the next frame in the chain
An empty string indicates that there is no next frame.
